author: Jordan Pearson, Jason Koebler
title: Apple and Google's Coronavirus Tracking Plan Is a Symptom of Their Power
description: The tech giants aren't the first to propose a similar plan, but their power makes them the only available choices during a dire crisis. This influence isn't a fading remnant of the pre-pandemic world, but an enlarging feature of post-virus capitalism.
content: As the coronavirus pandemic rages on, national economies are crumbling under the weight of lockdowns that slow the spread of the virus and ultimately save lives. Capitalism can't wait any longer, and so governments are looking for a way to get people back to … [+7442 chars]
